data.text: Miɖo alẽviwo ɖe anyigbadziɖula la abe
Abe ale si wonyaa xe dzodzoewo le
“Ɖo aɖaŋu na mí, eye nàtso nya me na mí.
Na be Moab ƒe aʋasilawo nanɔ gbɔwò,
Woaɖo fiazikpui anyi le lɔlɔ̃ me.
Míese nu tso Moab ƒe dada,
Eya ta mafa avi abe Yazer
Dzidzɔ kple vivisese nu tso le abɔwo me,
Nye dzi le konyi fam le menye ɖe Moab ŋu
Ne eva eme be Moab do ɖe eƒe nuxeƒe la,
Esia nye nya si Yehowa gblɔ ɖi xoxo tso Moab ŋu.
Yehowa be, “Le ƒe etɔ̃ me tututu abe ale si agbatedɔwɔla xlẽa eƒe ƒee ene la, maɖi gbɔ̃ Moab ƒe atsyɔ̃ kple ame gbogboawo, ame siwo asusɔ la, woanɔ ʋɛe, eye womanɔ nemi me hã o.”
